entry.title: Pre-loading partial loader translations
entry.summary: Finding the balance between eager loading and lazy loading translation tables.

entry.title: AngularJS SEO friendly translation URLs with ui-router
entry.summary: Making your multilingual AngularJS application properly crawlable by search engine bots.

entry.title: SQLAlchemy with earthdistance
entry.summary: Postgresql has a handy extension for calculating distances between coordinates on earth, we are looking at how it all fits into SQLAlchemy ORM.

entry.title: SEO friendly angular-translate
entry.summary: SEO is a weak spot for AngularJS to begin with, but the issue takes a different turn when angular-translate is thrown into the mix.

entry.title: What's rotten in the state of Denmark?
entry.summary: We couldn't find what's rotten, but we have something better! We discovered Danish(tm) and it quickly became our new favorite place to read about danish design and architecture.

entry.title: What we liked on the web this year (so far)
entry.summary: We'll start our blogging operations with a relaxed article about some of the websites we liked this year. What are your favorites so far?

entry.title: Blog: open for business
entry.summary: We're super excited to launch a blog section on our website. We'll be writing about design, tech, code and everything in between.
